title: Russia Controversy Deepens For Trump White House
description: The intelligence community is reportedly investigating election-year contact between Trump campaign operatives and Russian intelligence officials. Plus Trump expresses openness to a one-state solution in the Israeli/Palestine conflict, and Labor Secretary nominee Andrew Puzder looks endangered. This episode: host/congressional reporter Scott Detrow, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and national security correspondent Mary Louise Kelly. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org. Find and support your local public radio station at npr.org/stations.
